channel.title: Phaser.JS on Code by Ember Zhang

item.title: Slot Machine
item.description: Description The Slot Machine is a game developed in JavaScript and Phaser.JS. Code: https://github.com/Center-for-Computational-Psychiatry/task_slot-machine-misophonia Purpose The Slot Machine game is a behavioral task designed for the Center for Computational Psychiatry at Mount Sinai Hospital. The game represents a widely used task paradigm (e.g. the “three-armed bandit” task) in cognitive behavioral research. It is typically used to track learning behavior for various clinical populations and healthy populations. In this case, it was used to track learning behaviors of patients with misophonia (a disorder characterized by strong distaste for everyday sounds e.
